channel.title: Dumb on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Dumb on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Dumb
item.description: She has this stream of power to her cupping her cask while muses dance. twelve at a time. drop a pair of dimes. i only watch and wait what will she do next. spindled twilight showered moonlight casting rays of soaked meat coat of indifference and i just watch and wait what will i do next with her. templed city atop that twisted hill. bullies chase up but don’t come down
